name: phone_number_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dimondevosint.
Tool description: It is an API for mobile phone number OSINT. If you abuse it, you will be immediately banned!
API description: Fetches public information about a given phone number from a specified API.

phone.description: The phone number for which public information is to be fetched.

captchasid.description: The captcha session ID to be included in the query, if available.

vkhash.description: The vkHash to be included in the query, if available.

captcha.description: The captcha response to be included in the query, if available.
